overview: Now, after several albums, it's time for the first-ever DVD of TAROT called "Live - Undead Indeed". The band filmed in show in the Finnish club Rupla in city of Joensuu in 2007. The concert itself is everything you can expect from TAROT: Pure Metal Power!
tagline: Rupla club in Kuopio, Finland on 17 August 2007
title: Tarot: Undead Indeed
